file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-27-11-04 - VENTILATION BOX - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL VENTILATION BOX - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH VENTILATION BOX 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the ventilation box assembly. B. The ventilation box assembly is installed in the passenger cabin, at zone 262. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH VEN- VENTILATION BOX ASSEMBLY - REMOV- 25-27-11-000-801-A TILATION BOX AL AIRCRAFT WITH VEN- VENTILATION BOX ASSEMBLY - INSTAL- 25-27-11-400-801-A TILATION BOX LATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-27-11 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-27-11-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH VENTILATION BOX 2. VENTILATION BOX ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the ventilation box assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-21-01-000-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the passenger seat, in the last right row, if necessary (AMM TASK 25-21-01-000-801-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the carpet (7) around the ventilation box (1). (2) Remove the screws (2) and washers (3) that attach the angles (4 and 8) to the floor. (3) Remove the screws (5) and washers (6) that attach the angles (4 and 8) to the ventilation box (1). (4) Remove the ventilation box (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-27-11 Page 2 of 4 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH VENTILATION BOX Ventilation Box Assembly Figure 401 ZONE PARTITION 262 (REF.) A PAX SEAT (REF.) B DET. A 2. SCREW 1. VENTILATION BOX 3. WASHER 2. SCREW 3. WASHER 6. SCREW 4. ANGLE 5. WASHER 5. WASHER 8. ANGLE 6. SCREW 7. CARPET FLOOR (REF.) DET. B 145AMM250370.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-27-11 Page 3 of 4 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-27-11-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH VENTILATION BOX 3. VENTILATION BOX ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the ventilation box. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-21-01-000-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the ventilation box (1) in its original position. (2) Install the angles (4 and 8) on the floor with the screws (2) and washers (3). (3) Install the angles (4 and 8) on the ventilation box (1) with the screws (6) and washers (5). (4) Install the carpet (7) around the ventilation box (1). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the passenger seat, at the last right row (AMM TASK 25-21-01-000-801-A/400).
